tool_description: Validate VIES VAT numbers in EU as well as NIF, NIE and CIF numbers in Spain.
name: Validador DNI
title: Validador DNI

api_list.name: CIF
api_list.description: The CIF value is sent to be validated. This is the tax ID for all Spanish companies. It consists of a letter followed by eight digits. The letter represents the type of company (e.g., Ltd company). This number also serves as a Spanish VAT number. Example: B12345678

required_parameters.name: value
required_parameters.description: Please provide the CIF number you wish to validate.

api_list.name: EU VAT Validation (VIES)
api_list.description:
VIES VAT number is sent for validation. You can verify the validity of a VAT number issued by any Member State. It is an electronic mean of validating VAT-identification numbers of economic operators registered in the European Union for cross border transactions on goods or services. Examples: Examples: ESB85537108, IE6388047V, CZ44017774, GB778603785, FR59542051180.
Supported countries: AT, BE, BG, CY, CZ, DE, DK, EE, EL, ES, FI, FR, GB, HR, HU, IE, IT, LT, LU, LV, MT, NL, PL, PT, RO, SE, SI, SK

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: Supported countries: AT, BE, BG, CY, CZ, DE, DK, EE, EL, ES, FI, FR, GB, HR, HU, IE, IT, LT, LU, LV, MT, NL, PL, PT, RO, SE, SI, SK

api_list.name: NIF
api_list.description: Sends value of DNI (NIF) to be validated. Spanish Fiscal Identification Number and Foreign Identification Number masking. ... An NIF is an eight character value where the first seven characters are a serial number and the final character is an alphabetic suffix. The suffix is a check digit. Example: 12345678Z

required_parameters.name: value
required_parameters.description: After the NIF number is sent for validation, the system will indicate if the provided NIF number is valid or invalid.

api_list.name: NIE
api_list.description: NIE value is sent for validation.  The NIE is constituted of a letter (X, Y or Z) followed by 7 digits and ends with a letter. For example: X1234567L

required_parameters.name: value
required_parameters.description: Please provide the NIE number you wish to validate.
